query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS piano_technical_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
  piano_id INT NOT NULL,
  partner_id INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  organization_id INT,
  height DECIMAL(6,2),
  width DECIMAL(6,2),
  depth DECIMAL(6,2),
  weight DECIMAL(7,2),
  number_of_keys INT DEFAULT 88,
  number_of_pedals INT DEFAULT 3,
  number_of_strings INT,
  hammer_type VARCHAR(100),
  soundboard_material VARCHAR(100),
  frame_material VARCHAR(100),
  keyboard_type VARCHAR(100),
  touch_weight VARCHAR(50),
  last_tuning_date TIMESTAMP NULL,
  last_regulation_date TIMESTAMP NULL,
  last_maintenance_date TIMESTAMP NULL,
  technical_notes TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS piano_inspection_reports (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,
  od_id VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL,
  piano_id INT NOT NULL,
  client_id INT NOT NULL,
  partner_id INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1,
  organization_id INT,
  report_number VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  inspection_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  inspector_name VARCHAR(255),
  inspector_id INT,
  inspection_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  overall_condition VARCHAR(50),
  estimated_value DECIMAL(10,2),
  exterior_condition JSON,
  interior_condition JSON,
  mechanical_condition JSON,
  sound_quality JSON,
  recommendations TEXT,
  estimated_repair_cost DECIMAL(10,2),
  urgency VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'normal',
  photos JSON,
  pdf_url VARCHAR(500),
  notes TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

  estimated_value DECIMAL(10,2),
  exterior_condition JSON,

  sound_quality JSON,

  estimated_repair_cost DECIMAL(10,2),

  photos JSON,
  pdf_url VARCHAR(500),
  notes TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
